## Functions

### ClearKillFlags() {#a8e9bc607d4404b54c7bc4f650da97008}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void ClearKillFlags (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI, <a href="#a31166d6c29e87920b15c368afb02a571">RegisterSet</a> &amp; Uses)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Clear kill flags for any uses in the given set.

This will likely conservatively remove more kill flags than are necessary, but removing them is safer than incorrect kill flags remaining on instructions.

Definition at line <a href="#l00110">110</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb2itblockpass-cpp">Thumb2ITBlockPass.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### TrackDefUses() {#adc8d1d32a1860d5e21f283b913ac0880}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void TrackDefUses (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI, <a href="#a31166d6c29e87920b15c368afb02a571">RegisterSet</a> &amp; Defs, <a href="#a31166d6c29e87920b15c368afb02a571">RegisterSet</a> &amp; Uses, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &#42; TRI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
TrackDefUses - Tracking what registers are being defined and used by instructions in the IT block.

This also tracks &quot;dependencies&quot;, i.e. uses in the IT block that are defined before the IT instruction.

Definition at line <a href="#l00079">79</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/thumb2itblockpass-cpp">Thumb2ITBlockPass.cpp</a>.

<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// llvm models select&#39;s as two-address instructions. That means a copy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is inserted before a t2MOVccr, etc. If the copy is scheduled in</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First check if it&#39;s safe to move it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/removeloadsintofakeuses-cpp/#a0b427ca665b192edbeb8d6ca3c8f19fd">Uses</a>.count(DstReg) || Defs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset/#a2a98f19750ba941ce791b75ca6d77e48">count</a>(SrcReg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the CPSR is defined by this copy, then we don&#39;t want to move it. E.g.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if we have:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   movs  r1, r1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   rsb   r1, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   movs  r2, r2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   rsb   r2, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we don&#39;t want this to be converted to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   movs  r1, r1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   movs  r2, r2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   itt   mi</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   rsb   r1, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   rsb   r2, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc">MCInstrDesc</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mcid">MCID</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getDesc();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;hasOptionalDef() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getOperand(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mcid">MCID</a>.getNumOperands() - 1).getReg() == ARM::CPSR)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Then peek at the next instruction to see if it&#39;s predicated on CC or OCC.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If not, then there is nothing to be gained by moving the copy.</span></CodeLine>
